MS MCQs

    Get started with Asset Management for Dynamics 365 Supply Chain Management

    »

    1. Which statement is correct regarding functional locations?

      The structure of functional locations can be changed based on the physical location.

      Asset costs are static and never change.

      Functional locations are used to manage assets on locations.


    2. Assets can be installed on functional locations. Which statement is true regarding assets and functional locations?

      Assets can be installed on functional locations and, as required, can be installed on other functional locations later.

      The financial dimensions that are used for the asset costs are related to the asset, not the functional location.

      Assets can only be created in a hierarchical structure.


    3. Which of the following options contains examples of work order types?

      Active, Ended, or Not in use

      Preventive maintenance, corrective maintenance, or inspection

      Automatic or manual


    4. Which one of the following processes will you have to complete if your system administrator publishes a new workspace?

      Uninstall and then reinstall the application on your mobile device

      Uninstall, shut down, and then reinstall the application

      Refresh the list of mobile workspaces


    5. Which one of the following apps is used to leverage notifications of business events?

      Microsoft Dataverse

      Power Automate

      FMTDataHelper

      Data integrator template
